response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence. I believe this price reflects the quality and potential impact of the product on your endeavors. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
